notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by the Federation BioST from Reunion Island University (Zikapone project), the ZIKAlert project (European Union-Région Réunion program under grant agreement n° SYNERGY: RE0001902). E.F. holds a fellowship from the Regional Council of Reunion Island (European Union-Région Réunion program under grant agreement n° SYNERGY: RE0012406). J.T. has a PhD degree scholarship from La Réunion Island University (Ecole Doctorale STS), funded by the French ministry MEESR.
